column4: when you run ping in the commandline, is there a way to hide the output ping: unknown host ...? I've tried directing to /dev/null but it doesn't work
i'm writing a script to run when internet has been established, but when it's not, it's spitting out a lot of ping: unknown host to xsession-errors, and i'm trying to avoid that
2>/dev/null works well but then it spits stuff out when it is connected
